summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 13 and 14, Block 40, South Park Addition, and the west 57 1/2 feet of Lots 23 and 24, Block 47, Boston Company's Plat, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-204 and 17-151, respectively.
